edited_stories.edited_story_text: A woman was speaking during a presentation. The crowd was lit with excitement. Another presentation was given, this time, it was a man speaking. Throughout the entire speech, I couldn't help but notice the grin he wore the entire time. It was nearly infectious, as even the women that arrived in a bore, were suddenly content and entranced by it.
